# ohcleandat

This package provides useful functions to orchestrate analytics and data
cleaning pipelines for One Health projects.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ohcleandat from
[GitHub](https://github.com/one-health-research-consulting/ohcleandat)
with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("one-health-research-consulting/ohcleandat")
```

## Getting Started

For help guides, check out the package vignettes.

## Contributions

This project uses the [Gitflow
workflow](https://www.atlassian.com/git/tutorials/comparing-workflows/gitflow-workflow).

All new feature requests should be done in a new branch based on `dev`
or a fork of `dev`. New branches can take the form `feature/*` or
`fix/*`. Once the feature is complete, automated CI checks and merge
checks will be performed and a pull request should be raised to merge
changes into `dev`.

Once the package is nearing a release, a `release/x.x.x` branch should
be created from the head of `dev`. This is used to make any changes to
convert the code to production level and to increment the version number
and make release notes if required before raising a PR into `main`. Once
the PR into `main` is accepted, a github release should be performed,
using the package version as the tag.

A final step is deleting any feature and release branches and merging
`main` back into `dev` and incrementing the `dev` version to
`x.x.x.9000`.

## Getting Help

If you encounter a clear bug, please file a minimal reproducible example
on [github](https://github.com/ecohealthalliance/ohcleandat/issues).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`autobot()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/autobot.md)
  : Autobot Function
- [`check_id_existence()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/check_id_existence.md)
  : Check existence of ID columns across two tables
- [`class_to_col_type`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/class_to_col_type.md)
  : Class to Column Type lookup table
- [`combine_logs()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/combine_logs.md)
  : Combine Validation Logs
- [`correct_data()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/correct_data.md)
  : Correct data using validation log
- [`create_freetext_log()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/create_freetext_log.md)
  : Create Free Text Log
- [`create_questionnaire_log()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/create_questionnaire_log.md)
  : Create Validation Log for Questionnaire data
- [`create_rules_from_template()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/create_rules_from_template.md)
  : Create a "rules" file from a template
- [`create_structural_metadata()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/create_structural_metadata.md)
  : Create Structural Metadata from a dataframe
- [`create_translation_log()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/create_translation_log.md)
  : Create Translation Log
- [`create_validation_log()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/create_validation_log.md)
  : Create Validation Log
- [`detect_language()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/detect_language.md)
  : Detect Language
- [`download_dropbox()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/download_dropbox.md)
  : Download Drop Box Files
- [`download_googledrive_files()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/download_googledrive_files.md)
  : Download Google Drive Files
- [`dropbox_upload()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/dropbox_upload.md)
  : Dropbox Upload
- [`expand_frictionless_metadata()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/expand_frictionless_metadata.md)
  : Expand Frictionless Metadata with structural metadata
- [`get_dropbox_val_logs()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/get_dropbox_val_logs.md)
  : Get Dropbox Validation Logs
- [`get_odk_form_schema()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/get_odk_form_schema.md)
  : Get ODK Questionnaire Schema Info
- [`get_odk_responses()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/get_odk_responses.md)
  : Get ODK Questionnaire Response Data
- [`get_precision()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/get_precision.md)
  : Get Precision
- [`get_species_letter()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/get_species_letter.md)
  : Get Species Letter
- [`guess_col_type()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/guess_col_type.md)
  : Guess the column type
- [`id_checker()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/id_checker.md)
  : ID Checker
- [`make_report_urls()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/make_report_urls.md)
  : Make the URLs for the reports
- [`make_zip_path()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/make_zip_path.md)
  : Get make a zip file path
- [`obfuscate_gps()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/obfuscate_gps.md)
  [`obfuscate_lat()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/obfuscate_gps.md)
  [`obfuscate_lon()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/obfuscate_gps.md)
  : Obfuscate GPS
- [`othertext_lookup()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/othertext_lookup.md)
  : Look-up table for 'Other' questions
- [`prune_datapackage()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/prune_datapackage.md)
  : Prune field properties in a data package
- [`read_excel_all_sheets()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/read_excel_all_sheets.md)
  : Reads all tabs from an excel workbook
- [`read_googlesheets()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/read_googlesheets.md)
  : Read Google Sheets Data
- [`remove_deletions()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/remove_deletions.md)
  : Utility function to identify records for deletion
- [`ru_odk_case()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/ru_odk_case.md)
  : Convert to same case as in RuODK
- [`schema_from_odk_xlsx_template()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/schema_from_odk_xlsx_template.md)
  : Create ODK Schema from XLSX template
- [`set_diff()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/set_diff.md)
  : Get items that differ between x and y
- [`update_frictionless_metadata()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/update_frictionless_metadata.md)
  : Update descriptive metadata in frictionless datapackage
- [`update_structural_metadata()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/update_structural_metadata.md)
  : Update structural metadata
- [`validation_checks()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/validation_checks.md)
  : Validation Correction Checks
- [`write_rds()`](https://One-Health-Research-Consulting.github.io/ohcleandat/reference/write_rds.md)
  : Write data RDS
